nodes.text: KRONOS-841 was a member of the Droid Gotra during the Fall of the Republic. Over a decade before the first Empire Day in the C.R.C. year 7958, KRONOS and other members of the Gotra attended the Xrexus Cartel's auction of Eldra Kaitis, a Jedi Padawan. The droids placed a bid by proxy, and they were outbid by Jee Kra.

During the Galactic Empire's first year, KRONOS was detained by Imperial forces and interrogated by Tanivos Exantor Divo. In exchange for leniency, KRONOS surrendered a memory dump of information pertinent to the Xrexus auction.
KRONOS-841 was first mentioned in the canon reference book Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo and published in 2018.
